Uses of Package
com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs

  • Packages that use com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs 
    Package Description
    com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs  
    com.outbrain.aletheia.datum  
    com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.consumption  
    com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production  
  • Classes in com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs used by com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs 
    Class and Description
    Breadcrumb
    Metadata containing information (source, destination, time frame, count ) about a particular datum type's transportation from one point to another.
    BreadcrumbBaker
    A base interface for generating Breadcrumb instances according to a bucketKey, processingTimestamp and a bucketHitCount provided by the BucketBasedBreadcrumbDispatcher.
    BreadcrumbDispatcher
    A base interface for implementing a class that will be dispatching Breadcrumb instances.
    BreadcrumbHandler
    The base interface for handling breadcrumbs emitted by the BucketBasedBreadcrumbDispatcher.
    BucketStartWithDuration 
  • Classes in com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs used by com.outbrain.aletheia.datum 
    Class and Description
    BreadcrumbBaker
    A base interface for generating Breadcrumb instances according to a bucketKey, processingTimestamp and a bucketHitCount provided by the BucketBasedBreadcrumbDispatcher.
    BreadcrumbDispatcher
    A base interface for implementing a class that will be dispatching Breadcrumb instances.
    BreadcrumbHandler
    The base interface for handling breadcrumbs emitted by the BucketBasedBreadcrumbDispatcher.
    BucketBasedBreadcrumbDispatcher
    A hit counter that uses buckets in order to aggregate incoming hits.
    BucketStartWithDuration 
  • Classes in com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs used by com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.consumption 
    Class and Description
    BreadcrumbDispatcher
    A base interface for implementing a class that will be dispatching Breadcrumb instances.
  • Classes in com.outbrain.aletheia.breadcrumbs used by com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production 
    Class and Description
    Breadcrumb
    Metadata containing information (source, destination, time frame, count ) about a particular datum type's transportation from one point to another.
    BreadcrumbDispatcher
    A base interface for implementing a class that will be dispatching Breadcrumb instances.
    BreadcrumbHandler
    The base interface for handling breadcrumbs emitted by the BucketBasedBreadcrumbDispatcher.
    BreadcrumbsConfig
    Holds the configuration details for breadcrumbs emitted by the DatumProducer.
